tool_description: Informacion de la locazion con el codigo postal
name: Codigos Postales MX
title: Codigos Postales MX

api_list.name: Obtener CP
api_list.description: Obtén la lista de códigos postales encontrados acorde al parámetro solicitado
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://codigos-postales-mx.p.rapidapi.com/cp/64720"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codigos-postales-mx.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://codigos-postales-mx.p.rapidapi.com/cp/{cp}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "codigos-postales-mx.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
